alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 9:59AM EST until March 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in Cuyahoga County increasing to 2 to 5 inches elsewhere. Locally higher amounts possible in the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga, Lake, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will struggle to stick to paved surfaces through this afternoon, but roads can turn slick at times under briefly heavier snow. Snow accumulations will vary significantly with elevation today. The potential for slick road conditions will increase this evening as the sun sets and temperatures fall below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake
